content: this legal text summarizes a court ruling in a case involving the division of a real estate property among multiple coowners the court has ordered the dissolution of the coownership and declared a division project prepared by a courtappointed consultant as enforceable specific lots including a dwelling annex buildings and land have been assigned to each party the court has also ordered the drawing of lots to allocate equal portions among parties with equal shares the court has determined the value of the property and assigned portions accordingly the court has addressed the existence of an easement and the need for adjustments by certain parties the court has concluded that the division project is final and ordered the parties to proceed with the allocation of the lots the court has also addressed the costs of the proceedings stating that they should be shared among the parties the court has made a final ruling ordering the dissolution of the partnership and assigning specific properties to each party the court has also arranged for a drawing of lots to allocate the remaining lots the costs of the case will be fully offset by the parties and the court has authorized the transcription of the judgment
